feats. A sword that balances strength and
beauty as elegantly as this one is a rare find.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_025_Desc:
Koroks made this sword for Hylians. It's
made of wood, so it isn't the best choice for
head-on attacks. Its original intent was likely
clearing vines to forge paths through forests.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_025_PictureBook:
Koroks made this sword for Hylians. It's
made of wood, so it isn't the best choice for
head-on attacks. Its original intent was likely
clearing vines to forge paths through forests.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_027_Desc:
The ornamentation that adorns this blade is
a traditional Zora design. It's forged from a
very durable and rust-proof metal.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_027_PictureBook:
The ornamentation that adorns this blade is
a traditional Zora design. It's forged from a
very durable and rust-proof metal.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_029_Desc:
This common sword is often carried by
Gerudo women for self-defense. Its short,
curved blade is easily recognized.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_029_PictureBook:
This common sword is often carried by
Gerudo women for self-defense. Its short,
curved blade is easily recognized.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_030_Desc:
Delicate Gerudo carvings decorate this
curved sword. The engraved blade is
extremely sharp. Apparently it once
served ceremonial purposes in festivals.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_030_PictureBook:
Delicate Gerudo carvings decorate this
curved sword. The engraved blade is
extremely sharp. Apparently it once
served ceremonial purposes in festivals.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_031_Desc:
Rito craftsmen forged this lightweight,
double-edged sword so Rito warriors
could soar into battle unhindered by
its weight.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_031_PictureBook:
Rito craftsmen forged this lightweight,
double-edged sword so Rito warriors
could soar into battle unhindered by
its weight.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_033_Desc:
This magical sword was forged in the lava
of Death Mountain. It leaves white-hot flames
in its wake when the blade glows red.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_033_PictureBook:
This magical sword was forged in the lava
of Death Mountain. It leaves white-hot flames
in its wake when the blade glows red.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_034_Desc:
A magical sword forged in the frigid
mountains of the Hebra region. When
the blade glows blue, enemies struck
by it will become frozen.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_034_PictureBook:
A magical sword forged in the frigid
mountains of the Hebra region. When
the blade glows blue, enemies struck
by it will become frozen.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_035_Desc:
A magical sword forged and refined by
lightning from the Hyrule Hills. When the
blade shines with a golden light, it will
electrocute enemies struck by it.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_035_PictureBook:
A magical sword forged and refined by
lightning from the Hyrule Hills. When the
blade shines with a golden light, it will
electrocute enemies struck by it.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_040_Desc:
This strange hammer is one of Kilton's
specialties. Being struck by it doesn't hurt
much, but the fourth swing in a string of
attacks will send the victim flying.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_040_PictureBook:
This strange hammer is one of Kilton's
specialties. Being struck by it doesn't hurt
much, but the fourth swing in a string of
attacks will send the victim flying.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_041_Desc:
A single-edged sword traditional to the
Sheikah tribe. Forged using ancient
technology, it just may be among the
sharpest conventional weapons ever made.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_041_PictureBook:
A single-edged sword traditional to the
Sheikah tribe. Forged using ancient
technology, it's said to be among the
sharpest conventional weapons ever made.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_043_Desc:
This torch will stay lit once ignited, but if you
put it away, the flame will be extinguished
until you light it again.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_043_PictureBook:
This torch will stay lit once ignited, but if you
put it away, the flame will be extinguished
until you light it again.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_044_Desc:
Wooden branches such as this are pretty
common, but it's surprisingly well-balanced.
It doesn't do much damage but can serve
as a weapon in a pinch.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_044_PictureBook:
Wooden branches such as this are pretty
common, but it's surprisingly well-balanced.
It doesn't do much damage but can serve
as a weapon in a pinch.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_047_Desc:
A Sheikah-made replica of the sword that
seals the darkness. It was made with ancient
technology to oppose the Great Calamity,
but its low durability made it inefficient.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_047_PictureBook:
A Sheikah-made replica of the sword that
seals the darkness. It was made with ancient
technology to oppose the Great Calamity,
but its low durability made it inefficient.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_048_Desc:
A magical rod that can cast three fireballs
at once, crafted by an ancient magician.
It will break upon running out of magical
energy, so make it last!
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_048_PictureBook:
A magical rod that can cast three fireballs
at once, crafted by an ancient magician.
It will break upon running out of magical
energy, so make it last!
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_049_Desc:
A magical rod that can cast extreme cold in
a wide range. These are crafted from refined
ice found at the summit of Hebra Peak.
It will break when depleted.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_049_PictureBook:
A magical rod that can cast extreme cold in
a wide range. These are crafted from refined
ice found at the summit of Hebra Peak.
It will break when depleted.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_050_Desc:
A magical rod that can hurl three balls of
electricity at once. Its gem contains
electricity from the Hyrule Hills, and the rod
will break when that electricity runs out.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_050_PictureBook:
A magical rod that can hurl three balls of
electricity at once. Its gem contains
electricity from the Hyrule Hills, and the rod
will break when that electricity runs out.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_051_Desc:
This throwing weapon was originally used by
the forest-dwelling Koroks. Its unique shape
allows it to return after being thrown.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_051_PictureBook:
This throwing weapon was originally used by
the forest-dwelling Koroks. Its unique shape
allows it to return after being thrown.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_052_Desc:
A famous sword once beloved by the Gerudo
Champion Urbosa. It is said that when
Urbosa swung this sword in battle, her
movements resembled a beautiful dance.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_052_PictureBook:
A famous sword once beloved by the Gerudo
Champion Urbosa. It is said that when
Urbosa swung this sword in battle, her
movements resembled a beautiful dance.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_053_Desc:
A grim weapon favored by the Yiga. The half-
moon shape of the blade allows for the rapid
delivery of fatal wounds and serves as a
symbol of their terror. Its durability is low.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_053_PictureBook:
A grim weapon favored by the Yiga. The half-
moon shape of the blade allows for the rapid
delivery of fatal wounds and serves as a
symbol of their terror. Its durability is low.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_057_Desc:
A sword said to have once belonged to a
hero from the sky. Its blade houses the fire
of the Goddess. When wielded, a strange
yet heavenly breeze kicks up around you.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_058_Desc:
A sword once wielded by a hero in an
ancient age. When grasped, a strange sense
of nostalgia washes over you. Take it when
going alone would otherwise be dangerous.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_059_Desc:
A boomerang said to have been used by a
hero who traveled the Great Sea. It smells
faintly of salt water.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_060_Desc:
A magical rod that can cast fireballs, crafted
by an ancient magician. The rod will break if
it strikes something directly, so use it wisely.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_060_PictureBook:
A magical rod that can cast fireballs, said to
have been crafted by an ancient magician.
The rod will break if it strikes something
directly, so use it wisely.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_061_Desc:
A magical rod crafted from refined ice found
in the Hebra Mountains. This rod can cast
waves of freezing air. Great for magicnot so
great for melee.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_061_PictureBook:
A magical rod crafted from refined ice found
in the Hebra Mountains. This rod can cast
waves of freezing air. Great for magicnot so
great for melee.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_062_Desc:
A magical rod that can shoot balls of
electricity. Its gem contains lightning from
the Hyrule Hills. It's not recommended to
use as a melee weapon.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_062_PictureBook:
A magical rod that can shoot balls of
electricity. Its gem contains lightning from
the Hyrule Hills. It's not recommended to
use as a melee weapon.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_070_Desc:
The legendary sword that seals the
darkness. Its blade gleams with a sacred
luster that can oppose the Calamity. Only a
hero chosen by the sword itself may wield it.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_070_PictureBook:
The legendary sword that seals the
darkness. Its blade gleams with a sacred
luster that can oppose the Calamity. Only a
hero chosen by the sword itself may wield it.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_073_Desc:
This lethal weapon is forged by the Yiga.
Its unique shape facilitates the sound
dispatching of any target and strikes
fear into the hearts of all who see it.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_073_PictureBook:
This lethal weapon is forged by the Yiga.
Its unique shape facilitates the sound
dispatching of any target and strikes
fear into the hearts of all who see it.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_080_Desc:
The legendary sword that seals the
darkness, a blade whose sacred glow can
combat the Calamity. Link's conquests in the
Trial of the Sword have amplified its splendor.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_081_Desc:
The legendary sword that seals the
darkness, a blade that can combat the
Calamity. Link's triumph over the Trial of
the Sword has awakened its true splendor.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_502_Desc:
A weapon that defeats foes with one hit and
causes the user to die from one hit. It loses
its sheen and power after two consecutive
uses, but will eventually regain both.
WeaponSmallSword.Weapon_Sword_502_PictureBook:
A weapon that defeats foes with one hit and
causes the user to die from one hit. It loses
its sheen and power after two consecutive
uses, but will eventually regain both.

WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_001_Desc:
A spear used mainly by travelers to fend off
wolves and other beasts. It's easy to hold
and simple to use.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_001_PictureBook:
A spear used mainly by travelers to fend off
wolves and other beasts. It's easy to hold
and simple to use.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_002_Desc:
A long spear once used by the guards of
Hyrule Castle. Easy to use but difficult to
master. The iron tip is very sturdy, and the
shaft will not burn when exposed to flame.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_002_PictureBook:
A long spear once used by the guards of
Hyrule Castle. Easy to use but difficult to
master. The iron tip is very sturdy, and the
shaft will not burn when exposed to flame.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_003_Desc:
A spear used by knights adept in mounted
combat. The spearhead is modeled after
an axe.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_003_PictureBook:
A spear used by knights adept in mounted
combat. The spearhead is modeled after
an axe.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_004_Desc:
A spear haphazardly carved from a large tree
branch. It looks like its original intent was for
skewering meat and cooking it, but it does
have some combat merit as well.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_004_PictureBook:
A spear haphazardly carved from a large tree
branch. It looks like its original intent was for
skewering meat and cooking it, but it does
have some combat merit as well.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_005_Desc:
A Boko spear enhanced with sharpened
animal bones. It's light, easy to use, and
deals a decent amount of damage.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_005_PictureBook:
A Boko spear enhanced with sharpened
animal bones. It's light, easy to use, and
deals a decent amount of damage.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_006_Desc:
This Boko spear has been strengthened with
fossilized bones. The bones are positioned
outward so the fangs bite at the opponent.
Beware Bokoblins carrying this weapon.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_006_PictureBook:
This Boko spear has been strengthened with
fossilized bones. The bones are positioned
outward so the fangs bite at the opponent.
Beware Bokoblins carrying this weapon.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_007_Desc:
The brutal, ripping edge of this weapon's
spearhead is a distinctly Lizalfos design.
Its low durability doesn't lend itself to
extended use.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_007_PictureBook:
The brutal, ripping edge of this weapon's
spearhead is a distinctly Lizalfos design.
Its low durability doesn't lend itself to
extended use.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_008_Desc:
Judging by the harpoon-like spearhead of
this Lizalfos-made spear, the Lizalfos use
it for fishing as well as combat. Try not to
get caught on the wrong end of its barbs.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_008_PictureBook:
Judging by the harpoon-like spearhead of
this Lizalfos-made spear, the Lizalfos use
it for fishing as well as combat. Try not to
get caught on the wrong end of its barbs.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_009_Desc:
Skilled Lizalfos warriors tend to favor this
spear. What it lacks in piercing power, it
makes up for with the brutal wounds its
dual ripping blades will inflict.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_009_PictureBook:
Skilled Lizalfos warriors tend to favor this
spear. What it lacks in piercing power, it
makes up for with the brutal wounds its
dual ripping blades will inflict.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_010_Desc:
This wooden spear is most often used by
Moblins. It's made from a hastily whittled
tree, so its stabbing power and durability
are both pretty low.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_010_PictureBook:
This wooden spear is most often used by
Moblins. It's made from a hastily whittled
tree, so its stabbing power and durability
are both pretty low.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_011_Desc:
This Moblin-made spear uses a horned
animal bone as the spearhead. Like many
Moblin weapons it's sloppily made, but this
one packs some respectable piercing power.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_011_PictureBook:
This Moblin-made spear uses a horned
animal bone as the spearhead. Like many
Moblin weapons it's sloppily made, but this
one packs some respectable piercing power.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_012_Desc:
This spear is a fan favorite among Moblins.
The spearhead is made from fossilized
bones adorned with spikes, which greatly
increases its stabbing power.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_012_PictureBook:
This spear is a fan favorite among Moblins.
The spearhead is made from fossilized
bones adorned with spikes, which greatly
increases its stabbing power.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_013_Desc:
Wielded by Guardian Scouts, this spear has
a high piercing power and is a testament to
the Sheikah's high level of technology. The
spearhead appears only when brandished.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_013_PictureBook:
Wielded by Guardian Scouts, this spear has
a high piercing power and is a testament to
the Sheikah's high level of technology. The
spearhead appears only when brandished.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_014_Desc:
The tip of this Guardian spear has been
enlarged and strengthened. It's a bit shorter
than your average spear, perhaps to facilitate
use in tight spaces.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_014_PictureBook:
The tip of this Guardian spear has been
enlarged and strengthened. It's a bit shorter
than your average spear, perhaps to facilitate
use in tight spaces.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_015_Desc:
This Guardian spear's output has been
boosted to the maximum. The spearhead
is designed for optimal stabbing, capable
of easily piercing most armor.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_015_PictureBook:
This Guardian spear's output has been
boosted to the maximum. The spearhead
is designed for optimal stabbing, capable
of easily piercing most armor.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_016_Desc:
The crescent-shaped spearhead of this
Lynel-made weapon gives it poor balance,
making it difficult to wield. Lynels, however,
can swing it effectively with a single hand.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_016_PictureBook:
The crescent-shaped spearhead of this
Lynel-made weapon gives it poor balance,
making it difficult to wield. Lynels, however,
can swing it effectively with a single hand.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_017_Desc:
The weight and cutting edge of this Lynel-
made spear have both been enhanced. It's
immensely heavy for a Hylian, but a Lynel
can cleave through rock with a single swing.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_017_PictureBook:
The weight and cutting edge of this Lynel-
made spear have both been enhanced. It's
immensely heavy for a Hylian, but a Lynel
can cleave through rock with a single swing.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_018_Desc:
White-haired Lynels favor this brutal spear.
Its axe-like spearhead and exceptional 
weight give it absolute destructive power.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_018_PictureBook:
White-haired Lynels favor this brutal spear.
Its axe-like spearhead and exceptional 
weight give it absolute destructive power.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_021_Desc:
A rusty polearm likely used by knights from
an age past. The spearhead is in bad shape
due to prolonged exposure to the elements,
so its durability is low.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_021_PictureBook:
A rusty polearm likely used by knights from
an age past. The spearhead is in bad shape
due to prolonged exposure to the elements,
so its durability is low.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_022_Desc:
A farming tool used to collect hay efficiently.
It's light enough to be used by anyone.
The four prongs are very sharp.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_022_PictureBook:
A farming tool used to collect hay efficiently.
It's light enough to be used by anyone.
The four prongs are very sharp.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_023_Desc:
This spear is the result of countless hours
of research into the ancient technology
used by Guardians. The glowing spearhead
has high piercing potential.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_023_PictureBook:
This spear is the result of countless hours
of research into the ancient technology
used by Guardians. The glowing spearhead
has high piercing potential.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_024_Desc:
This spear was issued to the knights who
guarded Hyrule Castle's throne room. Its
ornate design was applied by a craftsman
in service to the royal family.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_024_PictureBook:
This spear was issued to the knights who
guarded Hyrule Castle's throne room. Its
ornate design was applied by a craftsman
in service to the royal family.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_025_Desc:
The Koroks made this spear for Hylians.
The shaft is made from a light, sturdy wood,
offering ease of use. The spearhead is made
from a much harder wood, offering strength.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_025_PictureBook:
The Koroks made this spear for Hylians.
The shaft is made from a light, sturdy wood,
offering ease of use. The spearhead is made
from a much harder wood, offering strength.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_027_Desc:
This spear is a Zora's weapon of choice.
It's lighter than it looks due to being made
from a special metal and is used by the Zora
for both fishing and protecting their domain.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_027_PictureBook:
This spear is a Zora's weapon of choice.
It's lighter than it looks due to being made
from a special metal and is used by the Zora
for both fishing and protecting their domain.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_028_Desc:
The most skilled Zora fighters wield this
spear. Its beautiful fish-tail design belies
its impressive strength; the spearhead
can pierce even the toughest scales.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_028_PictureBook:
The most skilled Zora fighters wield this
spear. Its beautiful fish-tail design belies
its impressive strength; the spearhead
can pierce even the toughest scales.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_029_Desc:
This spear's center of gravity is in its tip,
making it a bit unwieldy for the average
fighter. But in the hands of a skilled Gerudo
warrior, it's a weapon of reliable strength.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_029_PictureBook:
This spear's center of gravity is in its tip,
making it a bit unwieldy for the average
fighter. But in the hands of a skilled Gerudo
warrior, it's a weapon of reliable strength.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_030_Desc:
A specialized spear weighted to excel as a
throwing weapon. It's perfectly balanced
to be thrown farther than your average spear,
able to pierce targets from a great distance.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_030_PictureBook:
A specialized spear weighted to excel as a
throwing weapon. It's perfectly balanced
to be thrown farther than your average spear,
able to pierce targets from a great distance.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_031_Desc:
Goron artisans used recycled metal to forge
this weapon. The tip is made from an old
excavation bore, which affords it unmatched
piercing capabilities.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_031_PictureBook:
Goron artisans used recycled metal to forge
this weapon. The tip is made from an old
excavation bore, which affords it unmatched
piercing capabilities.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_032_Desc:
Its lightweight design is a hallmark of
Rito craftsmanship. It's made from light
and sturdy materials, which afford Rito
warriors ease of use during aerial combat.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_032_PictureBook:
Its lightweight design is a hallmark of
Rito craftsmanship. It's made from light
and sturdy materials, which afford Rito
warriors ease of use during aerial combat.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_033_Desc:
A magical spear forged in the magma of
Death Mountain. Attack when the blade
glows to expel powerful flames.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_033_PictureBook:
A magical spear forged in the magma of
Death Mountain. Attack when the blade
glows to expel powerful flames.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_034_Desc:
A magical spear forged from ancient ice
taken from the Hebra Mountains. Attack
when the blade glows blue to chill the air
and freeze your foe.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_034_PictureBook:
A magical spear forged from ancient ice
taken from the Hebra Mountains. Attack
when the blade glows blue to chill the air
and freeze your foe.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_035_Desc:
A magical spear that contains thunder from
Thundra Plateau in its tip. Attack when the
blade glows with a golden light to unleash
an electrical attack.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_035_PictureBook:
A magical spear that contains thunder from
Thundra Plateau in its tip. Attack when the
blade glows with a golden light to unleash
an electrical attack.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_036_Desc:
Just a mop to the untrained eye, it excels at
tidying up the place. But it owes its sturdy
construction to a true craftsman, so it
actually has some combat merit.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_036_PictureBook:
Just a mop to the untrained eye, it excels at
tidying up the place. But it owes its sturdy
construction to a true craftsman, so it
actually has some combat merit.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_037_Desc:
The spearhead of this weapon is uniquely
Sheikah in design. Spear masters of the
Sheikah tribe can use the crescent shape to
snag their opponents and deliver brutal cuts.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_037_PictureBook:
The spearhead of this weapon is uniquely
Sheikah in design. Spear masters of the
Sheikah tribe can use the crescent shape to
snag their opponents and deliver brutal cuts.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_038_Desc:
A fisherman's tool that excels at catching
large fish. Its particularly sharp spearhead
makes it valuable as a weapon as well.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_038_PictureBook:
A fisherman's tool that excels at catching
large fish. Its particularly sharp spearhead
makes it valuable as a weapon as well.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_047_Desc:
This Sheikah-made spear was created using
ancient technology to combat the Calamity.
Its attack power is very high, but a critical
design flaw left it with poor durability.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_047_PictureBook:
This Sheikah-made spear was created using
ancient technology to combat the Calamity.
Its attack power is very high, but a critical
design flaw left it with poor durability.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_049_Desc:
A spear modeled after the Lightscale Trident
wielded by the Zora Champion Mipha. They
may be identical in appearance, but this
spear's strength and durability are inferior.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_049_PictureBook:
A spear modeled after the Lightscale Trident
wielded by the Zora Champion Mipha. They
may be identical in appearance, but this
spear's strength and durability are inferior.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_050_Desc:
A spear of peerless grace cherished by the
Zora Champion Mipha. Although Mipha
specialized in healing abilities, her
spearmanship was in a class all its own.
WeaponSpear.Weapon_Spear_050_PictureBook:
A spear of peerless grace cherished by the
Zora Champion Mipha. Although Mipha
specialized in healing abilities, her
spearmanship was in a class all its own.

CookEffect.AllSpeed_MedicineDesc:
Grants a low-level haste effect, which
boosts your movement speed while
running, swimming, or climbing.
CookEffect.AllSpeed_MedicineDesc_02:
Grants a mid-level haste effect, which
boosts your movement speed while
running, swimming, or climbing.
CookEffect.AllSpeed_MedicineDesc_03:
Grants a high-level haste effect, which
boosts your movement speed while
running, swimming, or climbing.
CookEffect.AttackUp_MedicineDesc:
Grants a low-level might effect, which
strengthens your body and mind to boost
your attack power with all weapons.
CookEffect.AttackUp_MedicineDesc_02:
Grants a mid-level might effect, which
strengthens your body and mind to boost
your attack power with all weapons.
CookEffect.AttackUp_MedicineDesc_03:
Grants a high-level might effect, which
strengthens your body and mind to boost
your attack power with all weapons.
CookEffect.DefenseUp_MedicineDesc:
Grants a low-level toughness effect, which
fortifies your bones to strengthen your
defense. Best to use before facing off
against hard-hitting enemies.
CookEffect.DefenseUp_MedicineDesc_02:
Grants a mid-level toughness effect, which
fortifies your bones to strengthen your
defense. Best to use before facing off
against hard-hitting enemies.
CookEffect.DefenseUp_MedicineDesc_03:
Grants a high-level toughness effect, which
fortifies your bones to strengthen your
defense. Best to use before facing off
against hard-hitting enemies.
CookEffect.ExGutsMaxUp_Desc: Restores and overfills your Stamina Wheel.
CookEffect.ExGutsMaxUp_MedicineDesc:
Restores stamina and temporarily extends
your Stamina Wheel. The additional stamina
will disappear as it's used.
CookEffect.Fireproof_Desc:
Grants a fireproof effect, protecting you from
catching fire in hot environments.
CookEffect.Fireproof_Desc_02:
Grants a high-level fireproof effect, protecting
you from catching fire in hot environments.
CookEffect.Fireproof_MedicineDesc:
Grants a fireproof effect, which prevents your
body from catching fire.
Be sure to pack this when venturing out
to explore Death Mountain.
CookEffect.Fireproof_MedicineDesc_02:
Grants a high-level fireproof effect, which
prevents your body from catching fire.
Be sure to pack this when venturing out
to explore Death Mountain.
CookEffect.GutsRecover_Desc: Instantly refills some of your Stamina Wheel.
CookEffect.GutsRecover_MedicineDesc:
Restores your stamina, which is used when
performing physical actions such as 
climbing walls or swimming.
CookEffect.LifeMaxUp_Desc:
Restores your health and temporarily
increases your maximum hearts.
CookEffect.LifeMaxUp_MedicineDesc:
Restores you to full health and increases
your maximum hearts. The additional hearts
are lost as you take damage.
CookEffect.Quietness_MedicineDesc:
Grants a low-level stealth effect, which
calms the nerves and silences footfalls.
Allows you to move about undetected by
monsters and animals.
CookEffect.Quietness_MedicineDesc_02:
Grants a mid-level stealth effect, which
calms the nerves and silences footfalls.
Allows you to move about undetected by
monsters and animals.
CookEffect.Quietness_MedicineDesc_03:
Grants a high-level stealth effect, which
calms the nerves and silences footfalls.
Allows you to move about undetected by
monsters and animals.
CookEffect.ResistCold_MedicineDesc:
Grants a low-level warming effect, increasing
your resistance to cold environments. Very
useful when exploring snow-covered
mountains.
CookEffect.ResistCold_MedicineDesc_02:
Grants a high-level warming effect,
increasing your resistance to cold
environments. Very useful when exploring
snow-covered mountains.
CookEffect.ResistElectric_MedicineDesc:
Grants a low-level resistance to electricity.
Useful against enemies with electrical
attacks.
CookEffect.ResistElectric_MedicineDesc_02:
Grants a mid-level resistance to electricity.
Useful against enemies with electrical
attacks.
CookEffect.ResistElectric_MedicineDesc_03:
Grants a high-level resistance to electricity.
Useful against enemies with electrical
attacks.
CookEffect.ResistHot_MedicineDesc:
Grants a low-level cooling effect, raising
your body's resistance to heat. Crucial for
long journeys through the desert.
CookEffect.ResistHot_MedicineDesc_02:
Grants a high-level cooling effect, raising
your body's resistance to heat. Crucial for
long journeys through the desert.
